li.label: Iota Psyker
li.description: The Warp hums softly within me, a faint whisper rather than a roar. My connection is limited, but sufficient. I wield this power with precision and restraint, knowing I walk a finer line than most.

li.label: Epsilon Psyker
li.description: The warp flows through me, steady and strong. Its whispers guide me, its power fuels me, yet I remain vigilant.

li.label: Delta Psyker
li.description: The warp surges within me, potent and commanding. Its tides are fierce, but I have the strength to harness them. Though the temptation of chaos is ever-present, my resolve keeps me steadfast.

li.label: Beta Psyker
li.description: The warp is a storm within me, vast and unrelenting. I wield a power few can comprehend, let alone control. Every thought, every action must be precise, for my power hovers on the brink of destruction. Yet I am no mere instrument of the Immaterium - I am its master.

li.label: Alpha Psyker
li.description: The warp bends to my will, its infinite power coursing through me like a roaring tempest. I am a living beacon of the Immaterium, my abilities far beyond what mortals can fathom. Such power is both a blessing and a burden, for even the slightest misstep could obliterate worlds.
